channel.title: Godwars bosses, players can only solo them?
channel.description:
When The bosses are under attack, and another player try to come in, it says "npc is already under attack" or some bullshit like that, any clue on how to fix it?
Gave a look in Npchandler, nothing in there(as of what i found)
Please and thank you.
